definition: hopes/good prospects
to hope for/to long for/to expect
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Human beings cannot do without something to look forward to.
sentences.chinese: 人，是绝不能没有盼头的。

sentences.english: But Putin has deftly managed the windfall and spread the wealth enough so that people feel hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 普京确实致力于将财富分散，所以人们觉得有盼头。

sentences.english: Cannavaro said his prize would give other defenders more hope.
sentences.chinese: 卡纳瓦罗说，他的获奖让其他的后卫有了盼头。

sentences.english: Holiday rituals give children points in the year to look forward to.
sentences.chinese: 过节的习惯使孩子们在一年里都有了盼头。

sentences.english: There isn't much to live for in this jail of a house.
sentences.chinese: 生活在这个监狱般的房子里，实在没什么盼头。

sentences.english: All she needs now is a life worth living for.
sentences.chinese: 现在她所需要的是一种过得有意思有盼头的生活。

sentences.english: I have to say that this gives me hope for Spider-Man 4.
sentences.chinese: 我得说，这让我对《蜘蛛侠4》有了点盼头。

sentences.english: We need something to look forward to as not to live a gloomy life.
sentences.chinese: 人，得天天有点什么盼头，生活才不至于暗淡。

sentences.english: A day without hope would be unimaginably pale.
sentences.chinese: 没有盼头是日子是苍白不可想象的。

sentences.english: Something you're so looking forward to after a brutal week at work.
sentences.chinese: 这可是辛苦工作一周的盼头啊。

definition: sth to strive for/prospect
erhua variant of 奔頭|奔头[ben4 tou5]
thoughts/what one has in one's heart
day/a (calendar) date/days of one's life
to yield interest, profit etc/to exhale (Buddhism)
future prospects/profit/to mature/to grow up
auspicious day/good day/happy life
wife, kids and a warm bed (idiom)/the simple and good life
pinyin: lao3 po2 hai2 zi5 re4 kang4 tou5

definition: enthusiasm for doing sth
hard times
whereabouts/place to settle/reliable source (of funds etc)/(of responsibility for a matter) to rest with sb/settlement/solution
tight (i.e. lacking money)/hard up/same as 緊巴巴|紧巴巴
to the end (of)/at the end of/in the end/to come to an end
to have an easy time/(feel) well
empty/desolate
to break clear of all the troubles and hardships/to achieve success/to make it
surplus money
